Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientServerCommunicator.CommunicatorListener
public class Client extends Object implements ClientServerCommunicator.CommunicatorListener
This class is responsible for managing the client (both GUI and CLI)

    • connect

      public void connect(String host, String port, Runnable successListener, Consumer<Throwable> errorListener)
      Connect to the server at the given host and port, and call the successListener if the connection is successful, or the errorListener if the connection fails
      Parameters:
      host - the hostname of the server to connect to (not parsed, raw input).
      port - the port to connect to (not parsed, raw input).
      successListener - a Runnable that will be executed if the connection is successful.
      errorListener - an error listener that will be called if an error occurs.
